attributes.action: Make a licence for motorways only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A driving licence for motorways, as the standard of driving on british motorways is getting really bad.

Access to motorways only by a electronic drivers tag after a new motorway driving test.
Bad drivers will have access to all motorways automatically denied.
And all new drivers not allowed on motorways for the first two years after passing their first time test, and then will have to pass the new motorway test, only if there licence has been kept clean for the two years after passing test.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
